title: Summon Ugly Thing
data:
{{obsolete}} {{Spell |name=Summon Ugly Thing |level=6 |school1={{Summonings}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
* [[Book of Summonings]]
|castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=0 }} {{Flavour|This spell summons a mutated otherworldly creature to the caster's aid.
You can sustain at most three creatures summoned by this spell.}} [[Summon Ugly Thing]] is a level 6 [[Summonings]] spell which summons a single friendly [[ugly thing]] (or a [[very ugly thing]] 80% of the time at max [[spell power]]). The summoned things last a long time and some of their branded attacks can be quite powerful, especially against vulnerable enemies. [[File:very_ugly_thing_chance.png]] ==History== *Summon Ugly Thing was removed in [[0.14]]. *Prior to [[0.10]], this spell could occasionally summon hostile ugly things, particularly at low spell power. *In [[0.6]], the spell was improved so that it always summoned very ugly things at high spell power. It was weakened to its current form in [[0.7]]. [[Category:Obsolete spells]]
